attributes.action: Remove the UK from Dictatorship that is the EU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The EU is a dictatorship were by unelected people meet in secret behind closed doors to discuss and implement the one shoe fits all laws but have a separate democratically elected house that get to debate the colour of the furniture. 
You cant dress up a dictatorship as a democracy and then cry foul when 1 million people in protest vote for the BNP.

Stop pretending and preaching democratic values if you you do not stand by them. 

This self protectionist attitude towards the EU is not to the benefit of the UK but is to politicians who are clearly protecting their own self interests by staying in the EU to appease the capitalist and EU masters/future employers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
